name: Stellar Predator
title: Fischl: Stellar Predator
desc: "The instant in which Ozvaldo Hrafnavins shows his great might."
inPlayDescription: When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Oz, and after Fischl uses a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack: Deal 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG. (Consumes <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s))

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Fischl to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Fischl, equip this card.After Fischl equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Nightrider once.When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Oz, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Oz will gain the following effect:  after Fischl uses a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack: Deal 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG. (Consumes <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Usage(s))(You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
